title: Overcurrent circuit-breaker
fullText:
The primary circuit of every isolation transformer shall be protected by a miniature overcurrent circuit-breaker (MCB) in accordance with AS/NZS 3111 or AS/NZS 60898.1.
The rating of the MCB shall not exceed the primary current rating of the transformer.
NOTE: This miniature overcurrent circuit-breaker may be the same device as the overload protective device required by AS/NZS 3000.
